newsitem.title: USA: Sterling Commerce, Caliber in pact.
newsitem.headline: Sterling Commerce, Caliber in pact.

text.p: Sterling Commerce Inc on Wednesday said it has signed an agreement to provide comprehensive electronic commerce outsourcing services to Caliber System Inc.
A sterling spokeswoman said the five-year contracts is worth $10 to $15 million per year.

Sterling will assume responsibility for all of Caliber's electronic data interchange (EDI) activities, the company said. Among the areas included are staffing, planning, operations, communications, trading partner management and customer support.
Caliber System is a provider of transportation, logistics and related information services.
